verses.name: Luke 9:39
verses.text: And, lo, a spirit taketh him, and he suddenly crieth out; and it teareth him that he foameth again, and bruising him hardly departeth from him.

verses.name: Luke 9:40
verses.text: And I besought thy disciples to cast him out; and they could not.

verses.name: Luke 9:41
verses.text: And Jesus answering said, O faithless and perverse generation, how long shall I be with you, and suffer you? Bring thy son hither.

verses.name: Luke 9:42
verses.text: And as he was yet a coming, the devil threw him down, and tare him. And Jesus rebuked the unclean spirit, and healed the child, and delivered him again to his father.
